ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Sorry, Torca isnt one to talk things out... Shomin, all i can say is, whoa.  I always thought Technorganic was the ultimate balance. Cyberwolf, Bluestreak

OOC: Sorry, Torca isnt one to talk things out...

Shomin, all i can say is, whoa.  I always thought Technorganic was the 
ultimate balance.

Cyberwolf, Bluestreak is already out of the CR chamber(and in bed with 
Andromeda)

:::Torca/Gigatron/The Skyscorchers/Jetstorm:::

Torca: Uh-oh.
::He rips the dorsal gun out of Skulletrons hands and runs to where 
Smokescreen and Spears are::
Torca: Sorry to interrupt, but we got a problem here.  We have an Alliance 
member here thats really damaged, but that doesnt mean hes not dangerous!  We 
gotta get him outta here!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Gigatron and the Skyscorchers were amazed. they knew nothing of human 
religion, so they didnt know the connections::
Gigatron: I have one question Child, what if the Maximals dont accept.  A lot 
of them are much more warlike then others.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Jetstorm lands and transforms::
Jetstorm:(in a british accent) The names Storm, Jetstorm.  I think your group 
is a good choice, and i will serve you well
